entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 23 April 2023
